page.title: 19Buxton:Local News July 1985.
page.content: People were talking about: {The new shopping development.} (There's going to be a Fine Fare and a Dorothy Perkins.But the work has been a trial,with all those lorries going in and out. It'll be nice when it's finished.) {Buxton's Wells and Carnival. (It's the Diamond Jubilee,and this year's Queen is Helen Turner.) {The Buxton Festival.}(Three Operas!) {Fairfield Post Office.}(Is it really threatened with closure?) {Peak Rail Rambler.}(A new service operated by Peak Rail and British Rail through the lovely Ashwood Dale.) {Channel 4.}(At last Buxton viewers can get that elusive fourth Channel!) {The Weather.}(Did you miss the summer? Which day was it? - A Buxton joke.)
